sourcesContent:
import { apiClient } from './ApiClient'

export const getAllTodos = apiClient.get(`/todos`)

export const deleteTodo
    = (username, id) => apiClient.delete(`/todos/${id}`)

export const retrieveTodo
    = (username, id) => apiClient.get(`/todos/${id}`)

export const updateTodo
    = (id, todo) => apiClient.put(`/todos/${id}`, todo)

export const createTodo
    = (todo) => apiClient.post(`/todos`, todo)
